title: Farmer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Watch. You will see the names of their visitors.
- At night, Inspect a player you've previously Watched. Learn what status effects they are under and if they're framed. Learn if they appear evil.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You cannot Inspect players you've Watched if you did not see anyone visit them.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - Choose a player. Learn if they received any status effects or were framed tonight. Unlimited uses.

desc:
Post 4693
*I saw someone creeping around my fields earlier!*
